title: Multimedia Beethoven: the ninth symphony (PC)
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
description: The Ninth Symphony will arouse your senses, stir your imagination and change forever the way you experience music. The composer's life is examined along with the cultural, social and political events which influenced him, and the musical composition are considered also as components of the Ninth Symphony are broken down and analysed. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: A multimedia PC or compatiblewith a 386SX microprocessor, 4.5 MB of memory, at least 4MB of hard-disk space, CDROM drive, audio board, and VGA+ monitor. MS-DOS operating system and Microsoft Windows, versions 3.1 or later,
